attributes.action: facilitate links between Parliament and the real world by introducing Parliamentary job sharing or other forms of part time MP.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the Prime Minister to recognise that MPs are out of touch with the people and therfore to bring forward legislation facilitating links between Parliament and the real world outside politics, for example through Parliamentary job sharing or other forms of part time MP.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
